name: WPMU Infinite SEO Addon
author: Alex (Shurf) Frenkel

sections.description:
An addon on WPMU Infinite Seo, Fixes bugs with creating Meta-Description, and makes it working with multibyte.

Enjoy using WPMU MarketPress Allow Comments Plugin? Please consider making a small donation to support the software’s continued development.
sections.installation:
1. Download
  2. Upload to your /wp-contents/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where can I get the Infinite SEO plugin

You can get Infinite SEO plugin from WPMUDev.org website.

Can you add feature x, y or z to the plugin?

Short answer: maybe.

By all means please contact me to discuss features or options you’d like to see added to the plugin. I can’t guarantee to add all of them, but I will consider all sensible requests. I can be contacted here:
http://alex.frenkel-online.com/
